ygData.messageBody:
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Bill Mann [mailto:dabard@...]
> Sent: Monday, March 27, 2000 6:06 PM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: [eqbards] So ye want a Kisch, eh laddie? (Was Screenshots)
>
>
> From: "Bill Mann" <dabard@...>
>

> The Kisch comes off of the gnollie (can't remember his name
> now... go figure
> :oP ) that spawns in the old Captain's spot just off of the shaman room.
> It's Lore and No Drop. Have fun!

Tesch Val Dval'Nmak I think it was. He's a 1 hour or so spawn, level 40,
and the sword is his rare drop. If you can solo him and the room he is in
then I will be SUPER DUPER impressed Harm. Took me 2 weeks, good luck :)

Taneran
